info.description: This is bioos apiserver using Hertz.
info.title: BioOS Apiserver

parameters.description: workspace mount type, only support nfs
parameters.name: mountPath

get.summary: use to get workspace by id
use to list notebook of workspace

put.description: create notebook, update if name exist, set ipynb content in http body
put.summary: use to create or update notebook
use to update notebook server settings

post.description: turn notebook server on or off
post.summary: use to turn notebook server on or off

get.summary: use to list workflows of workspace

parameters.description: support order field: name/createdAt, support order: asc/desc, seperated by comma, eg: createdAt:desc,name:asc
parameters.name: orderBy

post.description: create workflow, add workflow version if id is given
post.summary: use to create or update workflow

parameters.description: support order field: version/path, support order: asc/desc, seperated by comma, eg: version:desc,path:asc
parameters.name: orderBy

parameters.description: workspace file ids seperated by comma
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: support order field: source/language/status, support order: asc/desc, seperated by comma, eg: status:desc,language:asc
parameters.name: orderBy

parameters.description: workspace version ids seperated by comma
parameters.name: ids

delete.summary: use to delete data model,support delete with data model name/row ids/headers

parameters.description: the data model headers should delete
parameters.name: headers

parameters.description: the data model row ids should delete
parameters.name: rowIDs

get.summary: use to list data model rows

parameters.description: data model entity set reffed entity row ids
parameters.name: inSetIDs

get.description: list all data model row ids
get.summary: use to list all data model row ids
use to check submission name unique

execute_count.description: in execute result; used to be pyout / prompt_number

file_extension.description:
codemirror_mode in docs is string but jupyter created is {"name":"ipython",...}
CodeMirrorMode string `json:"codemirror_mode"`
